H0.text: Which British band named themselves after a South African football team. Kaiser Chiefs

H1.text: Which British band named themselves after a South African football team. Arctic Monkeys

H2.text: Which British band named themselves after a South African football team. Bloc Party

H3.text: Which British band named themselves after a South African football team. Simon Rix

A4.text: The new name was taken from South African football club Kaizer Chiefs

A5.text: The band decided that they would aim for a longer-term record deal and started afresh with new songs and a new name: Kaiser Chiefs
